text: Zanna Bianca e il grande Kid is a 1977 Italian adventure western film directed by Vito Bruschini and starring Tony Kendall, Lea Lander, Fabricio Mariani and Gordon Mitchell. It is based on the 1906 novel White Fang, by Jack London. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Italian adventure films Category:Italian films Category:Teen adventure films Category:1970s children's adventure films Category:Italian Western (genre) films Category:Films based on White Fang Category:1970s Western (genre) adventure films
title: Zanna Bianca e il grande Kid
